data.eml:eml: Three new records of Nannosquillidae from Taiwan with notes on their ecology (Crustacea, Stomatopoda, Lysiosquilloidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Jing-Wen, Chiou, Tsyr-Huei (2017): Three new records of Nannosquillidae from Taiwan with notes on their ecology (Crustacea, Stomatopoda, Lysiosquilloidea). ZooKeys 721: 33-43, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.721.20588, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.721.20588
